title: User wants to generate a blank Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League contract letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND "Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League Contract" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League Contract"
custom_expected:
THEN system should print proper PDF of the letter
AND users should have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish. 
AND form should be generated in English if the language selected is English.
AND form should be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish. 
AND PDF should follow the provided format and details.

title: User wants to generate a Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers letter for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers" appears as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters". 
AND user is logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers" from the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters
custom_expected:
THEN system should print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile.
AND users should have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND users should have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND users should have the ability to enter the Waiver Expiration Date to be populated on the form. 
AND users should have the ability to enter the Request Date to be populated on the form. 
AND users should have the ability to enter the Office Number to be populated on the form. 
AND form should be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND form should be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details.

title: User wants to generate a blank Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters"
AND user is logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Notice of Unconditional Release Waivers" option
custom_expected:
THEN system should print the proper pdf of the letter
AND users should have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish. 
AND form should be generated in English if the language selected is English.
AND form should be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish. 
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details.

title: User wants to generate a blank Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters"

custom_expected:
THEN system should print the proper pdf of the letter.

title: Club user wants to print PDF of Results Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in with waivers permissions
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date for which the results bulletin has already been sent 
AND a Print button is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Print button
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to select "Result Bulletin" from the options available
AND selecting Result Bulletin should download a pdf of that day's Result Bulletin for the viewing Org to the user's computer
BUT If no Requests exist for the date then no Print button should display

title: Club user wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND user has entered a valid email address in the Email Utility to receive waiver Results bulletin emails
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Results bulletin is sent for the first time or resent
custom_expected:
THEN emails received by the club should have the pdf of the day's bulletin attached
BUT if no entries exist, then no attachment should be provided

title: Club user wants PDF of Results Bulletin attached to notification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND user is viewing their club's notifications widget
custom_steps: WHEN Waiver Results bulletin is sent for the first time or resent
custom_expected:
THEN description of the notification generated by the sending of the results bulletin or the resending of notifications should be clickable
AND clicking on the description should download the associated pdf of the results bulletin

title: BOC user doesn't want to see certain buttons for player in Results table
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND user has navigated to Waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date for which Results Bulletin has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Claims/Results section
custom_expected:
THEN If Waivers have been cancelled for a player, then no button should display
AND if BOC can only Cancel waivers for the player, then a simple "Cancel" button should be displayed
AND if BOC can create a player notification, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were not Claimed and not Cancelled)
AND if BOC can Player Accept or Player Reject, then a split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND once "Player Accept" or "Player Reject" has been selected for a player, BOTH of these options should no longer display for that player
AND if BOC can Create a Waiver Claim for a player, then a split button should be available with "Create Waiver Claim" and "Cancel" available. (request is awarded AND it is revocable AND we are before the withdrawal expiration date)

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user has navigated to waivers screen
AND user has selected a request date for which results bulletin has been sent
AND user is viewing claims/results section
AND "Create Waiver Claim" button is available for one or more players
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player
AND claiming Org's Cash Consideration should = $20,000 for all Waiver types except UR
BUT if player is a R5 DE/SEL player, then it should be $25,000
AND the player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND club should have the ability to add additional players and conditions as needed, then the WCA will follow the stateflow of a Trade

title: User wants to receive a notification if any UR Waiver Requests have not yet been accepted or rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a claimed UR waiver request exists for a player that still has not been player accepted or player rejected
AND a user is logged in as BOC Waiver Admin or player's Club's Waiver Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the nightly notification batch runs
custom_expected:
THEN system should check to see if any UR Waiver Requests that have been claimed still have not been player accepted or player rejected. 
AND if a waiver request is found that meets the above criteria, then the following notification should be generated for the BOC Waiver Admin as well as the player's Club's Waiver Admin user:       " Unconditional Release Waiver Claim Reminder.  [player name], has until [date] to accept or reject the assignment from [club]."

title: Batch Admin wants to see an Admin section on the Batches screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an "Admin" collapsible section has been added to the batches screen that is controlled by a new, batches admin LDAP group
AND a user is logged in with Batch Admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the "Admin" collapsible section of the batches screen
custom_expected:
THEN there should be a "Scheduled Batches" subsection
AND available within this subsection should be a "Run Now" button and a "Hold All" checkbox

title: BOC IT user wants to be able to hold all batches from running
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Batch Admin permissions
AND user has navigated to the Admin subsection of the Batches screen
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the "Hold All" checkbox within the Admin subsection of the Batches screen
custom_expected:
THEN system should prevent any scheduled batches from running 
BUT when this checkbox is unchecked, scheduled batches should run according to their scheduled time and priority order

title: BOC IT user wants to kick off all scheduled batches immediately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Batch Admin permissions
AND user has navigated to the Admin subsection of the Batches screen
custom_steps: WHEN user checks the "Run Now" checkbox within the Admin subsection of the Batches screen
custom_expected:
THEN system should kick off the nightly batch process immediately, regardless of the time
AND the batches should run in the same order they normally run at night

title: BOC IT user wants to be able to schedule the Waiver Expiration batch not to run
custom_preconds: GIVEN the backend has been set up to schedule the Waiver Expiration batch to NOT run on certain days
custom_steps: WHEN current date is equal to one of the dates the Waiver Expiration batch is set to NOT run
custom_expected:
THEN Waiver Expiration Batch should not run
AND players with waivers in effect that are set to expire should not be expired

title: UAT Feedback - BOC Confirmation message on removal of UR waiver request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in
AND a submitted UR waiver request exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks the trash can icon of an Unconditional Waiver request
custom_expected:
THEN system should should prompt the BOC to confirm its removal
AND warning should say "Are you sure you want to delete the UR waiver request for {Player} on {request date}?"
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with deletion
AND clicking "Back" should return user to the form

title: UAT Feedback - Update order of Request Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN valid emails are entered to receive Request Bulletin Email notifications in the Email Utility
AND "Send Emails" is set to yes
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Request Bulletin is sent
custom_expected:
THEN on the body of the email received for the Request bulletin, the order should be: 
1) Waiver type
2) Org alpha
3) Name alpha
 AND league order should no longer be present
